Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mercure Hotel Hannover Oldenburger Allee in Hannover (Lahe), you'll be close to Altwarmbuechener Lake and Hannover Medical School. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Silbersee and Hannover Zoo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 150 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including a sauna and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Hannover? This hotel has 8073 square feet (750 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Altwarmbuechener Lake - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Hannover Medical School - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Silbersee - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Hannover Zoo - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Eilenriede Stadium - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Hannover Congress Centrum - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Lister Platz - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Tiergarten Hannover - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi

SpielBank Hannover - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Schauspiel Hannover - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Ernst August Galerie - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Opera House - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Commedia Futura Theater - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Hotel Hannover Oldenburger Allee is Hannover (HAJ) - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Park Inn Hannover is Hannover (HAJ-Hannover Airport) - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi.
